scripts.description: This is a hash of script names (keys) and shell commands (values) to execute.

vars.description: This is a hash of variable names (keys) and values (values).

web-dir.description: Relative directory that contains files to be published as website

tests.description: llama-70b generated negative; focus on patternProperties keyword
tests.rust_error: Additional properties are not allowed ('start!' was unexpected)

                    '(values).',
     'additionalProperties': False,
     'patternProperties': {'^[a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z_0-9]*$': {'type': 'string'}}}
